node.excerpt: It’s December 28th, 2017. Around 3 pm we get a knock on the door. It is the police department. They tell me they want to speak to my husband because of an incident that happened at the courthouse…

frontmatter.title: Not until you walk in someone else’s shoes.

node.excerpt: Today a friend reached out to me and told me she and her husband were starting the whole custody process in court. I was shocked. They had been married for at least 20 years and have two teenage boys…
